mn139:3.1: This is adapted from the first sermon; text has _kāmasukhamanuyuñjeyya_ which is a briefer expression that the original _kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo_ ([sn56.11:2.3]()).
mn139:3.9: _Samaññā_ (“label”, from _√ñā_) ought not be confused with _sāmañña_ (“agreement”, from root _√mā_).
mn139:12.4: Most of these words are likely of Dravidian or Munda derivation.
